column1: #text=In the spring we bought some trees from a catalog and planted them in May .
#text=It was a nice warm day and the sun was shining .
#text=It was n't too hot because there was a cool breeze .
#text=We went out to the back garden with shovels and trowels , gardening gloves and the hose .
#text=Mine was for the white birch I had picked out , and my husband 's was for a hazel tree he had picked out .
#text=We laughed and talked as we worked , and the digging went quickly .
#text=The soil was also not too stony , which helped us greatly .
#text=Soon we had our trees in the holes , and held them upright as we scooped the dirt back into the holes with our trowels .
#text=We patted the dirt down , made sure the trees were upright , and gave them some water to grow on .
#text=Soon we would have two beautiful trees .
